name: Flicker Stellar
description:
Description:

You are a bus driver IN SPACE, who has to make sure all your passengers are flicked into their respective portal.

You have 3 minutes to get as many blobs and creatures into their portals as your can.

This is you.

Controls:

Steer ship: A and D
Speed boost: Hold down Shift
Hold on to passengers/Activate shields: Arrow Left and Arrow Right

This is your space-flick-ship.
